publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-3191# Ms Sandra White: Walk for Wallace—That the Parliament congratulates David Ross, Convener of the Wallace Society, on his magnificent achievement of walking from Glasgow to London to commemorate the 700th anniversary of the execution of William Wallace, one of Scotland’s greatest patriots; notes the increasing interest generated by these events in Scottish history and the call for this subject to be included in the school curriculum, and believes that the Scottish Executive should ensure that Scottish history is given its rightful place within the education system.
S2M-3191# Walk for Wallace (lodged on 26 August 2005) Mr Adam Ingram*, Michael Matheson*, Christine Grahame*
S2M-3191# Walk for Wallace (lodged on 26 August 2005) Linda Fabiani*
S2M-3191# Walk for Wallace (lodged on 26 August 2005) Donald Gorrie*
